root.description: Build specialized SaaS applications for legal professionals that preserve attorney-client privilege

children.story: TimeLawg - Automatic time tracking for lawyers
children.description: Windows 11 desktop application that automatically captures window activity for civil litigation lawyers, running in the background with second-level precision. All data stays local (SQLite) for attorney-client privilege preservation.
As a lawyer, I want the app to automatically track which windows and applications I use so that I don't have to manually log my time

children.story: Poll active window at configurable interval
children.description: Track active window title and application name every 1 second

children.story: Detect idle time from keyboard/mouse inactivity
children.description: Mark periods as idle when no input for configurable threshold (default 3 minutes)

children.story: Track start time, duration, and end time
children.description: Record precise timestamps for activity events
Detect when user switches windows to immediately capture screenshots
As a lawyer, I want screenshots captured periodically so that I can verify my activity and have visual evidence of my work
Capture screenshots at configurable intervals (default 10 seconds)
Capture screenshots when user switches focus between windows
Use dHash to avoid saving duplicate/similar screenshots
Capture screenshots from secondary monitors correctly
As a lawyer, I want the app to run unobtrusively in the system tray so that it doesn't interrupt my work
Toggle tracking with right-click menu
Configure app to auto-start when Windows boots
Green = tracking, Yellow = paused
As a lawyer, I want to view my recent activity so that I can review what I've worked on
Show events in a sortable table with start time, duration, end time, app, and title
Enter commands like 'screenshots', 'periodic', 'actions', 'quit' to perform actions
As a lawyer, I want to highlight log entries in the View Time window and delete them by typing 'delete' in the command field so that I can remove incorrect or irrelevant entries
acceptanceCriteria: User can select one or more rows in the Treeview (multi-select enabled)

Confirmation dialog shown before deletion with count of entries to delete
Events are permanently removed from database

Export events to structured JSON for LLM processing
Select date range for export
As a lawyer, I want all data stored locally so that attorney-client privilege is preserved
Store events and screenshots in local SQLite database

As a lawyer, I want to understand my time tracking coverage so that I can identify and explain gaps in my records
As a lawyer, when time is not tracked, I want to know why (was TimeLawg paused, was it not on, was time deleted) so that I can account for gaps in my billing records
As a lawyer, I want TimeLawg to log when tracking starts, pauses, and stops so that I can see exactly when tracking was active
As a lawyer, I want deleted time entries archived so that I know what time was removed and when
As a lawyer, I want to see a report of untracked periods with reasons so that I can explain billing gaps
As a lawyer, I want TimeLawg to detect if it crashed and record that as a reason for untracked time so that I know gaps weren't intentional
